sentences.en: An easy sweatshirt - knit pullover with wide straps, to wear layered or alone.
sentences.cn: 一款简单的套衫配上宽大的肩带, 休闲舒适.

sentences.en: But have you ever stopped to think of the many people who have been involved in producing that pullover you wear in winter?
sentences.cn: 但是你有没有停下来想一想，制作你在冬季穿的那件毛衫的过程中，涉及到了多少个人？

sentences.en: His fiancee knitted him a pullover.
sentences.cn: 他的未婚妻为他织了一件套头毛衣.

sentences.en: I am patching the elbows of his old pullover.
sentences.cn: 我在补他的旧套头衫的肘部.

sentences.en: I must put a warm pullover on because I'm freezing.
sentences.cn: 我都冻坏了,我得穿件暖和的羊毛衫.

sentences.en: I'm after a size 40 V neck pullover in grey.
sentences.cn: 我要一件40号灰色鸡心领套衫.

sentences.en: It's actually a chompa: a traditional, hand-knit pullover of alpaca wool considered refined among the indigenous people of Bolivia — such as the country's President, Evo Morales.
sentences.cn: 这事实上是件“chompa”：一种传统的羊驼毛针织套衫，这种服饰深受玻利维亚原住民喜爱——正如这个国家的总统埃沃·莫拉莱斯。

sentences.en: Mari refolded the darned pullover and socks.
sentences.cn: 玛丽把织补过的套头衫和袜子重新叠好。

sentences.en: My mother knitted me a pullover.
sentences.cn: 我妈给我织了一件套头的毛衣.

sentences.en: She wore a high - necked pullover to keep out the wind.
sentences.cn: 她穿一件高领套衫以御风寒.

sentences.en: The hot water shrank my pullover.
sentences.cn: 我的套头毛衣遇热水后收缩了.

sentences.en: The pullover stretched ( ie out of shape ) after I had worn it a few times.
sentences.cn: 这件套头毛衣我穿了几次之后就撑大了 ( 变形了 ).

sentences.en: The pullover stretched after I had worn it a few times.
sentences.cn: 这件套头毛衣我穿了几次之后就撑大了.
这件羊毛套衫你穿很合身。

sentences.en: What is the biggest V - neck grey pullover the shop has?
sentences.cn: 商店有的最大的灰色的V型领套衫是什么?

sentences.en: Y 3 Germany is begged buy women's and full jacket and pullover.
sentences.cn: Y3德国求购女式宽松外套和套衫.

sentences.en: Your pullover is on back to front.
sentences.cn: 你的套头毛衣前后穿反了.

trans.tran_en: a piece of  woollen  clothing without buttons that you wear on the top half of your body
